column4: I need some help. I can't connect my laptop to Internet at the moment, but i need to install ndiswrapper from a tar.gz. How can I do this? With wich commands can I do it?
able to understand a little bit german? http://wiki.ubuntuusers.de/WLAN/NdisWrapper
try to undestand my link with google, its very good... ask if you dont understand a certain passage
